sentences.en: A conundrum in the analysis of change.
A question or statement requiring thought to answer or understand; a conundrum.
sentences.cn: 需要思考才能回答或理解的问题或陈述; 谜语.

sentences.en: I asked him that conundrum you told me and he had the answer in a tick.
sentences.cn: 我问他你告诉我的那个谜,他马上就有了答案.

sentences.en: In this unfolding conundrum of life and history, a thing as being too late.
sentences.cn: 面对展示在我们面前的这个生活和历史难题, 有一样东西叫做悔之晚矣.

sentences.en: Interaction designers often face the conundrum of whether to make their products user - customizable.
sentences.cn: 交互设计者经常面临这样的难题,即是否让他们的产品具有用户定制功能.

sentences.en: It is a conundrum in game theory known as a prisoner's dilemma.
sentences.cn: 这在搏弈理论中被称做囚徒的困境.

sentences.en: Let me give you some history about a conundrum.
sentences.cn: 让我给你们一些关于谜题的历史.

sentences.en: Let me tell you what science has done with the conundrum.
sentences.cn: 让我告诉你们科学与谜题曾有的关系.

sentences.en: Many people -- too many to count -- share your career conundrum.
sentences.cn: 许多人 -- 多的数不过来 - 有着和你一样的职业难题.

sentences.en: Roles are the tools to answer this conundrum.
sentences.cn: 角色就是回答这个难题的工具.

sentences.en: Scientists had focused on two explanations to solve this conundrum.
sentences.cn: 科学家已锁定两种解释来解开这个难题。

sentences.en: The colorful mid - priced iMac has also succeeded by playing down the compatibility conundrum.
sentences.cn: 多色泽、中等价位的iMac的成功还在于它解决了计算机兼容性的难题.

sentences.en: the conundrum of our purpose on Earth
sentences.cn: 我们为何目的活在世上这一难题

sentences.en: This is a conundrum. What do you think?
sentences.cn: 这是个玩弄字谜的难题. 你怎样认为?

sentences.en: What I said was that there was some interest at Conundrum.
sentences.cn: 我说的是迷题出版社的人表示有兴趣.

sentences.en: Your mind resolves this conundrum by deciding that actually the study was pretty interesting after all.
sentences.cn: 你的大脑决定认为这个研究实际上比较有趣,以此来解决这个难题.
